entry.title: You Might Just Prove Me Wrong
entry.summary:
Author: CaptainDoofus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,603Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Bruce falls apart in the aftermath of his and Superman's ill-timed first kiss. The Bat-Family picks up the pieces until Superman swoops in to save the day.(In which neither Bruce nor Clark ever had anything to worry about.)
